name: Magma Energy
effect: Magma Energy can be attached only to a Pokémon with Team Magma in its name. Magma Energy provides {F} and /or {D} Energy but provides 2 Energy at a time. (Doesn’t count as a basic Energy card when not in play and has no effect other than providing Energy.) At the end of your turn, discard Magma Energy.
author: Takumi Akabane
